content.content: curioinvest-21280×720 388 KB  Join us on Zoom 2021-10-22T16:00:00Z to learn about the Curio Stablecoin (CSC) currently being proposed as a new collateral type. We will discuss the flow of tokens backing CSC and why it would be a helpful addition to MakerDAO’s collateral portfolio. Attendees: Vladimir Kislinskii CTO and @Fernando_Verboonen CEO Can’t make the call? No problem! Keep your eyes out for the recordings and transcripts on the following channels:  Youtube Podcast Transcripts  Leave your questions below and we’ll see you on the call! @Real-World-Finance @Recognized-Delegates @collateral-core-unit @Risk-Core-Unit
This full call is now available for review on the MakerDAO Youtube channel:

AMA call - Episode #10  October 22nd, 2021  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Jerry Goldfarb.  00:46: AMA about CurioInvest with Fernando Verboonen, Vladimir Kislinskii, and Vladimir Sushkov.  43:18: Outro   Video https://youtu.be/6P6ojD5bpTw  Introduction  Jerry Goldfarb  Agenda and Preamble 00:00  Hello to everybody. Thank you for joining us. Today we are joined by the CurioDAO Team Fernando Verboonen, Vladimir Kislinskii, and Vladimir Sushkov. We are here to talk about their MIP6 proposal for the CSC stablecoin backed by tokenized vehicles. For other episodes of AMA, please check the forum.   AMA with Fernando Verboonen, Vladimir Kislinskii, and Vladimir Sushkov from CurioDAO.  App of CurioDAO1920×1128 188 KB   Dai as payment vehicle1920×1125 187 KB   Schema1918×1131 156 KB   1920×1110 160 KB   1920×1129 207 KB   1919×1129 239 KB   1920×1121 264 KB   1914×1114 177 KB   1919×1125 242 KB   1917×1117 266 KB   1920×1119 238 KB   1920×1122 250 KB   1920×1116 252 KB   1920×1127 173 KB   Tokenization1920×1132 237 KB   Liquidity1920×1128 240 KB   Story of CurioDAO1920×1129 268 KB   non-fungible token1920×1120 178 KB   1919×1121 145 KB   Capital Flow1918×1134 245 KB   Suggestions1920×1131 151 KB  ![Flow](  Questions 23:36 - Jerry Goldfarb: CSC is not a stablecoin in circulation, but CurioDAO would be directly handling their treasury through a MakerDAO Vault. Is this right? Or is the stablecoin in circulation to people use it for other purposes other than interacting directly with CurioDAO? 24:52 - Jerry Goldfarb: If the Vault would need to be liquidated, is there a market for the trigger stablecoin? 26:01 - Jerry Goldfarb: You talked about the Chainlink being the price oracle for RWAs. Will there be other expansion into other Layer2, so that might not be the only place to obtain that information in the future, but just for now? I am talking in terms of us setting up an oracle for our side. 28:05 - Jerry Goldfarb: On a previous call, we discussed a poll you posted for community members to vote on what they think the next vehicle should be. How did that turn out? Has that gone anywhere? What decision did you take? 31:02 - Jerry Goldfarb: Vladimir, you mentioned earlier that you wanted to get into some of the future and potentials of this. We touched on the cars especially. Is there plans to expand currently into other markets? 35:53 - Jerry Goldfarb: The conversation around what L2s we should be using is becoming more and more important. Is there any reason why you have chosen Solana, Chainlink, and these other blockchains that you have? 40:28 - Jerry Goldfarb: Are you aware that we got our new Discord started? 40:51 - Jerry Goldfarb: Any last words? 42:27 - Jerry Goldfarb: Where can people reach out to you if they have further questions?  Closing Comment  Jerry Goldfarb  Outro 43:18  Happy weekend! Thanks to you all.   Credits  Kunfu-po produced this summary.  @gala produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.
